extendedInfo.description: DailyBurn Calorie Counter for Android!Get in the best shape of your life with DailyBurn.This is the ONE app you need to manage your diet and nutrition.  Fully backed by DailyBurn: the top fitness community on the web.  Manage your fitness and health goals on your Android Device and your data is automatically synced to our top-ranked website for more analysis, tracking at your computer, and more.â¤ You have seen DailyBurn on ABC, The Today Show, FoxNews, CNET, NYTimes, Washington Post, Lifehacker, Gizmodo, Mashable, and TechCrunch.  Why is DailyBurn better than the competition?â We are the only app to have the FoodScanner: use the device camera to scan the UPC barcodes of the foods you eat.  Quick logging without typing!â Food database of over 350,000 foods with actual pictures, full nutrition information, and food analysis.  No cartoons - this is the real thing.â Complete backup and analysis on DailyBurn.comNutrition and Calorie Tracking Featuresâ Complete database of 350,000 foods with pictures, nutritional information, and macronutrient breakdownâ Track Calories, but also protein, fat, carbs, fiber, sodium, etc.â Save your favorite foods for quick entryâ Quickly and easily add new foods to the databaseâ Scan foods for auto tracking with FoodScannerTry DailyBurn app today and we think you will say that this is the easiest-to-use, yet most robust nutrition app in the App Store.  Your goals are within reach!

reviews.title: No exercise tracker
reviews.comment: This app would be PERFECT if it had an exercise tracker. What\'s daily BURN without the burn?? Pretty good calorie tracker, and the barcode scanner is very cool. The other annoying thing is it doesn\'t do a good job of telling you if your nutritional stats are in range. It just tells you if you have met your max calories for the day.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Limited
reviews.comment: App is too limited and has small ambitions, but it does what it says. The barcode scanner is pretty cool. More metric measurement from users would be nice, but it\'s not dev\'s fault.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Its great for keeping track of what you eat, finding protein counts, and the scanner feature is super convenient and easy to use. I think it needs an update of some sorts for an error message that keeps occuring, which states a food can not be added to favorites, which is another nice feature. But other than that, I haven\'t had any problems with it.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Just getting started
reviews.comment: Thus far, so good. Have used for about a week. Starting to receive error messages but the app continues to work w/out error. Go figure. Selected app bc I can see log online. Wish it calculated water via app and better online.
reviews.author: Shalonda Cargill

reviews.title: Samsung galaxy reverb
reviews.comment: Wouldnt allow me to register which is upsetting because it looks like a great app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Constantly crashes, no way to customize options. Would b a great app at least if it didn\'t crash EVERY DAY, and erase all my favorites.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good, but not Great
reviews.comment: This is the best diet tracker I have used, it syncs nicely with the website. Interface isn\'t as nice as some others.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good, but silly limits
reviews.comment: I like this application, but it will only let me save a few favorite foods. I eat a lot more than 15 ingredients throughout the week, and having to search for an item daily is annoying.  Great otherwise.
reviews.author: Rob Barron

reviews.title: Needs more features
reviews.comment: After moving from the iPhone version, I was surprised that this version was missing some of the key features, such as being able to view my stats in a graph.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: HTC Rezound
reviews.comment: Keeps showing that it has crashed. If not for that, I\'d have no complaints at all.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: No calorie burned tracker
reviews.comment: It would be a perfect ap if we could log our workouts
reviews.author: Tony Stewart

reviews.title: Helpful but needs work
reviews.comment: This app is pretty good for logging what you eat through out the day and you can log your weight. You can see custom graphs of the process you\'ve made. I wish there was a way to log exercise and calories burned. UI could use an update
reviews.author: Shiraz Siddiqui

reviews.title: Not what I wanted
reviews.comment: Came up when I searched for \"sodium tracker\" but doesn\'t allow you to view or keep track of sodium counts.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Best
reviews.comment: Best app. Everything you need to keep track of what you are eating. I am starting to eat low carb and this is really helping me stay on track. Plus I like seeing everything I have eaten. You can also see the other days that you have already eaten and compare. Just a great app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Lacking compared to iPhone version
reviews.comment: The iPhone version has much better tracking to show you your daily intake relative to your individual macro goals.  It also shows the graph of several body tracking stats while this one only shows a list of data points.  Many features in general from the site are missing as well. Other than that it\'s ok, the features that ARE implemented are mostly done well.  But on an Android phone you might as well just go to the website outside of the bar code scanning ability.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Crash notification every launch plus poor design
reviews.comment: Very ugly app, disappointing it can go over a year with these problems and still no update for all of 2012
reviews.author: Dom Rossi

reviews.title: No Workout Tracking
reviews.comment: Since September of 2010 Android users have been promised an app from the DailyBurn staff. This software is a shadow of the greatnesss iOS users get. For anyone looking to track more than diet and weight this is a useless application.  If you\'re serious about fitness, not diet, don\'t waste your time. Uninstalled and paid DailyBurn service cancelled. After 14 months they still don\'t care about the desires of their subscribers.  One star only because zero stars isn\'t an option.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: best app ever
reviews.comment: keeps u very aware of ur intake
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Mostly good
reviews.comment: Great tracker for calories and macro nutrients. Not liking how often it gets errors or that I can\'t manually input a complicated meal
reviews.author: Christina Ritter

reviews.comment: I love dailyburn and have used it for years. I just don\'t like how this app only allows you to select from certain serving sizes instead of typing it
reviews.author: A Google User
